title: Intro to the Plane
description: Finish creating your character for a quick boost to get you started!

title: The Heavy Lifting
description: Fetch some Rusty Iron Ore from the Solstice Mine and bring it to the Forge.

title: Pigeon Patrol
description: The local statues are suffering. Thin out the pigeon population at the Plaza.

title: Spring Cleaning
description: The Shady Alley is getting... fuzzier. Eliminate the Sentient Dust Bunnies.

title: Sewer Scourge
description: The rats in the sewers are getting too big for their whiskers. Take down a few Buff Rats.

title: Timber for Oakhaven
description: The carpenter in Oakhaven is short on lumber. Chop some Pine Wood in Solstice and deliver it.

title: The Chef's Unusual Request
description: The chef in Glimmerhold refuses to explain why, but they want a Confused Guppy. Best not to ask.

title: Bread Delivery
description: The inn at Dusklight is out of bread. Cook some Edible-ish Bread in Solstice and bring it before the guests riot.
